ygData.subject: Re: Umm Twinking Still
ygData.msgSnippet: This isn t EVEN twinking.  You were reimbursed for a service that you performed.  You earned that equipment, you just didn t fight for it yourself. You should
ygData.messageBody:
This isn't EVEN twinking. You were reimbursed for a service that you
performed. You earned that equipment, you just didn't fight for it yourself.
You should not feel bad about wearing it, and telling the story of how you got
it.

Crier Sharpsong - 25th on fennin ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: <shinara@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 5:33 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Umm Twinking Still


> From: shinara@...
>
> I will probably regret sending this mail .. Please remember this is my first
mail list and I have only been playing EQ for about 2 months now, so many of
these comcepts are still new to me (Twinking, Item Camping, farming ??). I
have read the Glossary so I understand the meaning if not the concept.
>
> Last night I was hunting in Crushbone and was grouped with a very high level
player, I did not understand the EXP share problem. He just asked me to keep
singing my heal song and he would look after me, I grouped with him for
several hours and didnt get any exp. Anyway when I asked him about this he
said he would fix me up for my time. After a further hour I told him I needed
exp and would move on, at that point he said he had some stuff for me and
initiated a trade. I asked my friend via tell if I should accept and he said
yes as I earnt it. The Wiz gave me a Charred Chitchin Breastplate and a pair
of Blackened Iron Pants. I asked my friend if they were good (I could see via
AC and Stats they were, but how good?) he said they were, too good for my
level. I have banked them for now and wanted to ask the list if I should wear
them/sell them or give them away. I have no problem with twinking but dont
want to be called a cheat. So please no flames just an opinion on what I
should!
> do.
>
> Oh do all men like giving women stuff in EQ ?
>
> Regards
> Nina
>

>
> >
